alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 23 at 2:55AM AKDT until April 24 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Windy. Snow and blowing snow with low visibility over Steese Highway summits. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Wind chill values 25 to 35 below over highway summits. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands-. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will fall over the Steese Highway through Sunday, but little if any snow will fall north of the Steese Highway. Northeast winds gusting to 45 mph will continue all areas through Monday. Snow and blowing snow are causing low visibility over Steese Highway Summits. Areas north of the Steese Highway will have drifting snow, but visibility will remain above 1 mile. Wind chill values 25 to 35 below over highway summits.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
